# Repair Undead, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One undead creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 191

This spell functions as *[[Repair Undead (Spell)|repair undead]]*, except as noted above, and it cures 1d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20) on each selected creature.
